metadata.name: Letter To My Collectors (and Bidders)
metadata.description:
Dear ser or fren

I just wanted to say THANK YOU to yall for being with me on this weird journey for these two weird years. I am humbled and honored to have so many online strangers to throw money at me to own my art. This is amazing and crazy!

I know this year hit hard many of you. I appreciate those of you who kickstarted my cryptoart career during the bull run. I appreciate those of you who kept on collecting during the bear.

Expect more art from me, both on Ethereum and Tezos. Even on bitcoin/XCP! Maybe something before the end of the year. 

I believe the next year will be no worse than 2022. Actually, I believe it will be much better. For 2023 I wish you less wars and viruses but more pixels, big and smol.

Merry Xmas, Yole, Winter Solstice, whatever you celebrate. And a happy New Year!

Sincerely yours,  
BadFoxLab

P.S. I finally figured out how to let ALL of you know I moved from this address to the new one in the beginning of this year (duh). Some of you already know that, but not everyone is on twitter so here I am spamming your wallet. This letter is minted from the OG wallet. I still hold the keys for it, but since I donâ€™t have the seed phrase to import to Trezor/Ledger I decided it would be safer to use new wallet. For the provenance!

-----BEGIN ETHEREUM SIGNED MESSAGE-----  
This token is minted with 0xb26F7C17aD8fA03Dbe3f60E464b3E1dfE0D96D91 a.k.a. badfoxlabarchives.eth and signed with 0xDa07Cbe67aCA847143e56294f4148fdB75550c64 a.k.a. badfoxlab.eth
